title: Avacado Toast 🥑 || 4 ways || Open Sandwich  || Breakfast || Healthy Diet || Kids
content:
Open sandwich - Avacado Toast 🥑 Servings - 4 Duration - 20 mins Easy and quick breakfast recipe for kids / everyone at home. When you want to have healthy breakfast make sandwiches with full of veggies and flavours. It’s healthy & tasty too. How many of you like Avacado 🥑 ? I love Avacado in any way and mostly when Avacado is mixed with salt, pepper & lemon juice it tastes great.. I prepared Avacado spread you can checkout down below. You can checkout nutrition facts of avacado and other vegetables used in this open sandwich/ avacado toast. Previously, I have been shared recipes which included Avacado and you can have a look at below links Mexican Veggie Bowl 🎊|| 100th Recipe 😍|| Weekend Special 🍃 Healthy Green Sandwich Nutrition facts: Avacado: Vitamins A, C & B6. Minerals iron, calcium, potassium, magnesium & fiber Carrots: Vitamins : A, C & B6 Minerals : calcium, iron, magnesium & potassium Capsicum/ Bell pepper: Vitamins : A,C & B6 Minerals: Calcium, Iron & magnesium Onion: Vitamins: C & B6 Minterals: Iron, magnesium & potassium If you don't like Avacado this post is best way for you to eat Avacado very tasty and juicy.. Believe me I made Avacado Toast with 4 different vegetables and toppings which turned out super delicious 😋 obviously delicious. Hope you like them. Today I prepared healthy breakfast with toasted bread,  applied Avacado spread and finished with toppings Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Bread slices - Toasted - 4
Avacado Spread:
  • Avacado - ripped - 1 - chopped
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Fine black pepper powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Cliantro - 1/3 cup - chopped
  • Lemon juice - 1 tb sp
Toppings:
  • Carrot - 1 - julienne cut
  • Cucumber - 1/2 - semi circle cut
  • Spinach - 15 leaves - fresh
  • Red onion - 1/2 - slices
  • Red chilly flakes - 1 tsp
  • Italian seasoning - 1 tsp
  • Sesame seeds - white - 1/2 tb sp
  • Poppy seeds - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Pepper - 1/2 tsp
  • Olive oil - 1 tb sp
Procedure: Avacado Spread:
  • Take a bowl
  • Add avacado chunks
  • Add salt, pepper powder, lemon juice & chopped cilantro
  • Mix well
  • Basic avacado Spread is ready
  • Keep it aside
Avacado Toast: 🥑
  • Put toasted bread slices on plate
  • Apply avacado Spread on each toasted bread slices
Avacado Toast with carrot 🥕:
  • Add Carrot on toasted bread
  • Sprinkle red chilly flakes, sesame seeds, poppy seeds
  • Add just a pinch of salt & pepper powder
  • Add 1/2 tsp olive oil
  • Avacado Toast with Carrot & toppings is ready
  • Serve immediately
Avacado Toast with Spinach:
  • Add Spinach on toasted bread
  • Sprinkle sesame seeds & poppy seeds
  • Add just a pinch of pepper powder
  • Add 1/2 tsp olive oil
  • Avacado Toast with Spinach & toppings is ready
  • Serve immediately
Avacado Toast with Cucumber 🥒:
  • Add Cucumber on toasted bread
  • Sprinkle Italian seasoning, sesame seeds, poppy seeds
  • Add just a pinch of salt & pepper powder
  • Add 1/2 tsp olive oil
  • Avacado Toast with Cucumber & toppings is ready
  • Serve immediately
Avacado Toast with Onion:
  • Add 2 spinach leaves, Onion slices on toasted bread
  • Sprinkle sesame seeds, poppy seeds
  • Add just a pinch of salt & pepper powder
  • Add 1/2 tsp olive oil
  • Avacado Toast with Onion & toppings is ready
  • Serve immediately
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • Double the ingredients to make more toasts
  • You can customize your own Avacado Toast with other vegetables such as red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, sweet corn 🌽 , canned olives etc.,
  • Toppings - you can also add Choco chips, roasted peanuts, tomato sauce etc.,
